article: Dear Lucy, Thank you for your letter and your invitation. I really hope I can  go camping  with you. But I have to say  _  to you. I'm too  _  next week! On Monday, I'd like to see the doctor. There is  _  wrong with my  _  . I can't see people or things a little far  _  me clearly . Maybe I should  _  a pair of glasses. On Tuesday, I have football training. You know, I'm in the football team of our school. We'll have an English test on Friday morning,  _  on Wednesday and Thursday I have to stay at home and study hard. On Friday afternoon, I'm going to a  _  My favorite star Michael Jackson will come. I like his music very much. Have a good time! And please call me after you come  _  from the camping. Yours, Linda
